about_the_game:
VR HOT is a digital experience that allows you to create and interact with dream partners in VR and through a limited Desktop Mode.

Explore your most intimate desires in VR HOT, featuring fully immersive virtual environments and a construction kit to create and interact with your dream partners.

Embodiment
Experience a fully customizable virtual body (male or female). You’re not just a pair of floating gloves—you’re a complete, interactive presence.

Interaction
Your dream partner isn’t just a static doll. They talk, move, and respond dynamically to your actions.

Voice Commands
Communicate naturally by using the in-game menu or simply telling your partner what you want.
Innovative Physics System
Enjoy lifelike interactions with a cutting-edge system that seamlessly blends state-of-the-art physics and animations.

Thrust Control
Take immersion to the next level by using your controller to track your hip movements.

Customizability
Design and save your own unique characters—male, female or intersex (to an extent).

Socialize
Share your creations and discover new “Hotties” through our Discord community.

Limited Desktop Mode Perfect for character editing without a VR headset! Please note that the Desktop Mode is still under development and doesn’t offer the full functionality of VR mode. We are actively working toward (near) feature parity between the two modes.


Environments

Explore five unique settings to interact with your dream partners:

  • Room with a View

  • Single Bedroom

  • Minimal Room

  • Dungeon

  • Tropical Island
    Additionally a "Green Room" for a simple MR mode (only for users of the software "Virtual Desktop"!).

Additional Features

Vive Tracker Support
Connect Vive trackers to the Player body, your Hottie, or movable objects like toys, pillows, or chairs.

Teledildonics
Integrate compatible toys to feel what you see.

Hand Tracking
Ditch the controllers (most of the time) and use your real hands for interactions. This experimental feature works with select headsets.


Inclusivity and Diversity

  • Play as a male or female character with male or female partners.

  • Create intersex characters to an extent.

  • Discover greater diversity with a range of ethnically varied options.

Our Ethical Commitment

We stand firmly for consent. VR HOT promotes only consensual interactions between adults, ensuring a safe and respectful environment.

content_descriptors.notes:
VR HOT is an adult VR experience for creating and interacting with dream partners. VR HOT offers a virtual environment and a construction kit for dream partners and the interaction with them. 

You can play different levels of nudity - from fully dressed to fully nude, including realistic depiction of male and female genitalia. You can play interaction between a male and female players and male and female characters - from touching and stroking to full penetration, oral and vaginal. You can spank her butt, but there is only consensual sex between adults.

Explore your most intimate desires in VR HOT, featuring fully immersive virtual environments and a construction kit to create and interact with your dream partners.

name: VR HOT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti (at least 8GB VRAM!!!)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: All OpenXR-compatible headsets (not standalone) should be compatible. Compatibility tested and confirmed for Oculus Quest 1, 2, Pro (with Link), Valve Index and WMR headsets.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-7XXX series or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: All OpenXR-compatible headsets (not standalone) should be compatible. Compatibility tested and confirmed for Oculus Quest 1, 2, Pro (with Link), Valve Index and WMR headsets.

short_description: VR HOT is an immersive VR experience where users create and interact with custom dream partners in dynamic environments. Features include full-body customization, lifelike physics, voice commands, toy sync, and more. A limited Desktop Mode is available for editing characters without VR.
